name: Darts Peg Practice
description: This app has you practising the key elements of the 01 game.  The 1 dart screen has you working on finishing the main doubles. 40, 32, 24, 36, 4 and bull.  The 100+ screen has you practicing your power scoring.  Your successful attempts are recorded and stored.   You are then challenged to better previous day, week and month totals.  Once a previous total is bettered, it turns white.   The 2 dart and 3 dart screens have the user attempt the more difficult dart finishes.  Darts Peg Practice also has a dedicated darts gallery where your photos can be tagged with the relevant finish or score and quickly directed to your social media if you wish.
